long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction

Helix Fruit Jump is a casual arcade game where you control a ball that bounces through a platform made of fruit and cake slices. The goal is to reach the bottom of the platform without falling into the gaps or touching the blue areas.

How to Play

The game is played with the mouse. To move the ball, click and drag the mouse left or right. The ball will bounce off the walls of the platform. Be careful not to fall into the gaps or touch the blue areas, or you will lose the game.

Features

Easy to learn controls
Arcade sounds
2+ levels
Stylized graphics

Tips

Try to stay in the center of the platform as much as possible.
Be careful not to bounce too high, or you might fall into a gap.
Use the blue areas to your advantage. They can help you bounce to higher platforms.

- Play others games on the top-left menu
